name: Julian B. Gewirtz
bio: Julian Gewirtz is a poet and historian. His poems have appeared in AGNI, Boston Review, The Nation, the New Republic, Ploughshares, the Yale Review, and elsewhere. He is the author of a history of China's economic reinvention, Unlikely Partners: Chinese Reformers, Western Economists, and the Making of Global China (Harvard University Press, 2017). His reviews and essays have appeared in The American Scholar, The Economist, the Financial Times, the Wall Street Journal, and the Washington Post.
